text: Dr. Abdul Ghafoor: (; 5 May 1959 - 28 January 2020) was an Indian politician. He was the Minister of Minority Welfare in Nitish Kumar government of Bihar from 2015 through 2017. He was a member of the Bihar Legislative Assembly from 1995 to 2005 and again from 2010 until his death.The Telegraph - Calcutta His political party was Rashtriya Janta Dal (RJD). Ghafoor was born Saharsa, Bihar. Ghafoor died on 28 January 2020 at a hospital in Delhi at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Bihari politicians
title: Abdul Ghafoor
